title: How to decrypt PPPoE password of Huawei HG8245W5-6T?
content:
Can someone help me to decrypt the PPPoE password from a Huawei HG8245W5-6T fiber optic ont. The password has this format: "$2lT_)L2t{NViWZSYEt@"/qwP82OAN)<s+mv~AVu["$"

I tried to decrypt it with the Huawei configuration encryption and decryption tools but no luck. I need to put the Huawei in bridge mode but the internet provider won't provide the credentials.

comments.text: reverseengineering.stackexchange.com/questions/31024/â€¦ ? Older models also seem to have JTAG and serial. Could be helpful if the rest fails.

answers_data.content: This is a free tool for deciphering such passwords: https://andreluis034.github.io/huawei-utility-page/#cipher
